title: Reward of performing wudu before going to bed - Assim al hakeem
transcript: number five before going to bed and this is backed by the hadith of Brabant azib that the Prophet told him whenever you want to go to bed perform Moodle and then place or lie down on your right hand side and say the door so performing will do before going to bed is a highly recommended Sunnah it ensures that there's an angel seeking forgiveness for you throughout the night and that when you wake up and say the prescribed aura and make duaa you say the prescribed vicar and make dua Allah would answer your door insha'Allah
